mapper.sql:
SELECT SWR.HANDLED_TIME "handledTime", CASE SWR.RECEIVE_TYPE WHEN '104' THEN '调拨退货' WHEN '107' THEN '调拨换货退回' ELSE SWR.RECEIVE_TYPE END "receiveType", SWR.WAREHOUSE_NAME "wareHouse", SWR.TRANSFER_PARTNER_NAME "transferPartnerName", SWR.RECEIVE_CODE "receiveCode", SWRG.QUANTITY "quantity", CASE SWRG.WARES_STATUS WHEN '0' THEN '良品' WHEN '1' THEN '次品' ELSE SWRG.WARES_STATUS END "wareStatus", SWS.SKU_CODE "sku", SWS.SKU_NAME "skuName", SWS.MATERIAL_CODE "materialCode" FROM SYN_WMS_RECEIVE SWR LEFT JOIN SYN_WMS_RECEIVE_GOODS SWRG ON SWR.ID = SWRG.RECEIVE_ID LEFT JOIN SYN_WMS_SKU SWS ON SWRG.SKU_ID = SWS.ID
SWR.RECEIVE_TYPE IN ('104', '107') AND SWR.HANDLING_STATUS = '1' AND (SWRG.USE_FLAG IS NULL OR SWRG.USE_FLAG <> '0')
AND SWR.HANDLED_TIME >= to_date(#beginDate#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND SWR.HANDLED_TIME < to_date(#endDate#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')+1
ORDER BY SWR.HANDLED_TIME, SWR.WAREHOUSE_ID, SWR.RECEIVE_CODE, SWRG.SKU_CODE, SWRG.WARES_STATUS

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT SWSC.CREATE_TIME "time", SWB.ORDER_CODE "orderCode", SWB.REMARK_BACKING "backReason", CASE SWB.IS_INVOICE WHEN '1' THEN '有' WHEN '0' THEN '/' ELSE SWB.IS_INVOICE END "invoice", SWB.BACK_CODE "backCode", SWB.HANDLED_BY "handledBy", SWSC.QUANTITY "quantity", SWB.REMARK_BACKED "remark", SWSO.ORDER_USER "orderUser", IOS.SOURCE_NAME "backChannel", IOS.SOURCE_CODE "backOption", SWS.SKU_CODE "sku", SWS.SKU_NAME "skuName", SWS.MATERIAL_CODE "materialCode", SWBI.INDIV_CODE "IMEI", SWSI2.SHIPPING_NAME "shippingName" FROM SYN_WMS_STOCK_CHANGE SWSC LEFT JOIN SYN_WMS_SALES_ORDER SWSO ON SWSC.ORIGINAL_CODE = SWSO.ORDER_CODE LEFT JOIN SYN_WMS_STOCK SWSS ON SWSC.STOCK_ID = SWSS.ID LEFT JOIN SYN_WMS_SKU SWS ON SWSS.SKU_ID = SWS.ID LEFT JOIN SYN_WMS_BACK SWB ON SWB.ORDER_CODE = SWSO.ORDER_CODE LEFT JOIN SYN_WMS_BACK_INDIV SWBI ON SWB.BACK_CODE = SWBI.BACK_CODE AND SWS.SKU_CODE = SWBI.SKU_CODE LEFT JOIN (SELECT IWSI.SHIPPING_NO, MAX(SWS.SHIPPING_NAME) "SHIPPING_NAME" FROM SYN_WMS_SHIPPING_INFO IWSI LEFT JOIN SYN_WMS_SHIPPING SWS ON SWS.ID = IWSI.SHIPPING_ID GROUP BY IWSI.SHIPPING_NO) SWSI2 ON SWSI2.SHIPPING_NO = SWB.SHIPPING_NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT (WMS_SOURCE_CODE) SOURCE_CODE, WMS_SOURCE_NAME SOURCE_NAME FROM IUNI_ORDER_SOURCE ORDER BY WMS_SOURCE_CODE) IOS ON IOS.SOURCE_CODE = SWSO.ORDER_SOURCE
SWSC.STOCK_TYPE = '4' AND SWSC.BIZ_TYPE IN ('102') AND SWB.BACK_STATUS IN ('2', '4', '5')
AND SWSC.CREATE_TIME >= to_date(#beginDate#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND SWSC.CREATE_TIME < to_date(#endDate#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')+1
UNION ALL SELECT SWSC.CREATE_TIME "time", SWSC.ORIGINAL_CODE "orderCode", CASE WHEN SWSC.BIZ_TYPE = '103' THEN '拒收' WHEN SWSC.BIZ_TYPE = '106' THEN '刷单入库' ELSE SWSC.BIZ_TYPE END "backReason", NULL "invoice", NULL "backCode", NULL "handledBy", SWSC.QUANTITY "quantity", NULL "remark", SWSO.ORDER_USER "orderUser", IOS.SOURCE_NAME "backChannel", IOS.SOURCE_CODE "backOption", SWS.SKU_CODE "sku", SWS.SKU_NAME "skuName", SWS.MATERIAL_CODE "materialCode", NULL "IMEI", NULL "shippingName" FROM SYN_WMS_STOCK_CHANGE SWSC LEFT JOIN SYN_WMS_SALES_ORDER SWSO ON SWSC.ORIGINAL_CODE = SWSO.ORDER_CODE LEFT JOIN SYN_WMS_STOCK SWSS ON SWSC.STOCK_ID = SWSS.ID LEFT JOIN SYN_WMS_SKU SWS ON SWSS.SKU_ID = SWS.ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT (WMS_SOURCE_CODE) SOURCE_CODE, WMS_SOURCE_NAME SOURCE_NAME FROM IUNI_ORDER_SOURCE ORDER BY WMS_SOURCE_CODE) IOS ON IOS.SOURCE_CODE = SWSO.ORDER_SOURCE
SWSC.STOCK_TYPE = '4' AND SWSC.BIZ_TYPE IN ('103', '106')
AND SWSC.CREATE_TIME >= to_date(#beginDate#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND SWSC.CREATE_TIME < to_date(#endDate#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')+1
) T1 WHERE 1 = 1
AND T1."backOption" IN
#{item}
UNION ALL SELECT * FROM ( SELECT SWR.HANDLED_TIME "time", SWR.ORIGINAL_ID "orderCode", '调拨退货' "backReason", NULL "invoice", SWR.RECEIVE_CODE "backCode", NULL "handledBy", SWRG.QUANTITY "quantity", SWR.REMARK "remark", SWR.TRANSFER_PARTNER_NAME "orderUser", IOS.SOURCE_NAME "backChannel", IOS.SOURCE_CODE "receiveOption", SWS.SKU_CODE "sku", SWS.SKU_NAME "skuName", SWS.MATERIAL_CODE "materialCode", NULL "IMEI", NULL "shippingName" FROM SYN_WMS_RECEIVE SWR LEFT JOIN SYN_WMS_RECEIVE_GOODS SWRG ON SWR.ID = SWRG.RECEIVE_ID LEFT JOIN SYN_WMS_SKU SWS ON SWRG.SKU_ID = SWS.ID LEFT JOIN SYN_WMS_TRANSFER_PARTNER SWTP ON SWTP.ID = SWR.TRANSFER_PARTNER_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT (CODE) SOURCE_CODE, NAME SOURCE_NAME FROM SYN_WMS_TRANSFER_PARTNER WHERE CODE NOT IN ('88888', '110538') AND C_PARENT_ID IS NULL ORDER BY CODE) IOS ON IOS.SOURCE_CODE = SWTP.CODE
SWR.HANDLING_STATUS = '1' AND (SWRG.USE_FLAG IS NULL OR SWRG.USE_FLAG <> '0') AND SWR.RECEIVE_TYPE IN ('104', '107')
AND SWR.HANDLED_TIME >= to_date(#beginDate#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND SWR.HANDLED_TIME < to_date(#endDate#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')+1
) T2
AND T2."receiveOption" IN
#{item}

SELECT SWR.HANDLED_TIME "time", SWR.SUPPLIER_NAME "supplierName", CASE SWR.RECEIVE_TYPE WHEN '101' THEN '采购进货' WHEN '102' THEN '退换货' WHEN '103' THEN '拒收' WHEN '104' THEN '调拨退货' WHEN '105' THEN '采购退仓入库' WHEN '106' THEN '刷单入库' WHEN '107' THEN '调拨换货' WHEN '109' THEN '调拨入库' ELSE SWR.RECEIVE_TYPE END "receiveType", SWR.ORIGINAL_CODE "procurementSn", SWR.RECEIVE_CODE "receiveCode", SWRG.QUANTITY "quantity", SWR.REMARK "remark", SWS.SKU_CODE "sku", SWS.MATERIAL_CODE "materialCode", SWS.SKU_NAME "skuName", SWW.WARES_NAME "waresName" FROM SYN_WMS_RECEIVE SWR LEFT JOIN SYN_WMS_RECEIVE_GOODS SWRG ON SWRG.RECEIVE_ID = SWR.ID LEFT JOIN SYN_WMS_SKU SWS ON SWRG.SKU_ID = SWS.ID LEFT JOIN SYN_WMS_WARES SWW ON SWS.WARES_ID = SWW.ID
(SWRG.USE_FLAG IS NULL OR SWRG.USE_FLAG <> '0') AND SWR.RECEIVE_TYPE IN ('101','105','106','109')
AND SWR.HANDLED_TIME >= to_date(#beginDate#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND SWR.HANDLED_TIME < to_date(#endDate#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')+1
AND SWS.MATERIAL_CODE LIKE '%' || #materialCode# || '%'
AND SWR.ORIGINAL_CODE LIKE '%' || #procurementSn# || '%'
AND SWR.SUPPLIER_ID LIKE '%' || #supplierId# || '%'
AND SWR.RECEIVE_CODE LIKE '%' || #receiveCode# || '%'
ORDER BY SWR.HANDLED_TIME
